definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: How strong is the Lakers' home-court advantage?
sentences.chinese: 湖人有多大的主場優勢？

sentences.english: End of Nanjing has a team vs. Chongchao popular Chengdu Sheffield United.
sentences.chinese: 下場南京有有隊將主場迎戰衝超熱門的成都謝菲聯隊。

sentences.english: This was taken just before Newcastle's massive home game with Middlesbrough.
sentences.chinese: 圖片攝於紐卡主場對陣米堡的生死大戰前。

sentences.english: Next up for the Reds is the visit of Huddersfield Town to Carrington at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯的下一場比賽是本週末主場迎戰哈斯菲爾德。

sentences.english: I love to play in Rome and Barcelona and I think Arsenal has a nice stadium too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在羅馬和巴塞羅那比賽，阿森納的主場也很好。

sentences.english: Reasoning Villa have been great at home and recorded a victory over Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 阿士東維拉的主場成績不俗，戰勝過車路士。

sentences.english: But we even find it hard to beat them when we’re at home”.
sentences.chinese: 但即使是在主場，擊敗希洪也絕非易事。

sentences.english: There has not been a draw between the teams at Fulham in the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 英超歷史上兩隊在富勒姆的主場還未打成平局。

sentences.english: Wigan have never led against Liverpool at any stage of a home league game.
sentences.chinese: 維甘從來沒有在任何階段的主場比賽領先利物浦。

sentences.english: And two goals from Eduardo Salvio helped Benfica to a 4-1 home win against PSV Eindhoven.
sentences.chinese: 薩維奧獨中兩元幫助本菲卡主場4:1痛擊埃因霍溫。

sentences.english: In 1974, teams traded home court after each playoff game.
sentences.chinese: 1974年，每場季後賽結束之後球隊都要更換主場。

sentences.english: We have a chance because we are at home.
sentences.chinese: 下一輪我們主場作戰，是有機會取勝的。

sentences.english: Alston will serve his suspension Friday when the Magic host the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 週五魔術將主場迎戰凱爾特人，阿爾斯通將缺席。

sentences.english: Our team is very hard to toss at home.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊在主場是難以擊敗的。

sentences.english: So why does the hometown team more often win?
sentences.chinese: 那麼到底爲什麼主場隊伍總是能夠獲勝呢？

sentences.english: Roadwork is a novel of societal conflict, man vs. progress.
sentences.chinese: 道路工程，是社會衝突的小說，人主場迎戰進展。

definition: to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
half of a game or contest/half-court
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
total victory/to excel by far/name of a tank/slam
